post:
[SKB Enterprise](https://skb-enterprise.com/ "SKB Enterprise") is a hosting provider based in Amsterdam, The Netherlands. We build and operate all hardware ourselves to deliver our customers the highest performance and reliability for the best price!

Our VPS hypervisors are equipped with powerful AMD Ryzen / Epyc processors, which combined with fast NVMe SSD storage, give your VPS a huge performance boost!

**Why do Customers Choose Us?**
- Operating since 2013
- Resources are assigned Dedicated, so no overselling
- Only NVMe drives are used
- We build and operate our servers ourselves
- We believe in privacy & freedom for our customers
- We are RIPE member: 64425
- Support available all day, 365 days per year
- No contracts. Pay on a pre-paid basis
- Game/Voice servers, VPN, Streaming, Adult allowed
- Fully self-managed with Virtualizor control panel

**X1**
- 1 core
- 1 GB RAM
- 30 GB NVMe SSD
- Unlimited traffic (Fair Use)
- 100 Mbps up/down (upgradable)
**2,99 EUR per month** (~3,53 USD)
[Click to view plans & order](https://skb-enterprise.com/nvme-vps/ "Click to view plans & order")

**X2**
- 1 core
- 2 GB RAM
- 50 GB NVMe SSD
- Unlimited traffic (Fair Use)
- 100 Mbps up/down (upgradable)
**4,99 EUR per month** (~5,89 USD)
[Click to view plans & order](https://skb-enterprise.com/nvme-vps/ "Click to view plans & order")

For all our other bigger plans, [check our VPS page](https://skb-enterprise.com/nvme-vps/ "check our VPS page"). You can also configure a VPS with custom specifications! See: https://clients.skb-enterprise.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=117

Additional discount (save up to 15%!!):
Payment per 3 months: 5%
Payment per 6 months: 10%
Payment per 12 months: 15%

Hypervisor specifications:

AMD Ryzen 9, AMD Epyc  or Intel Xeon CPUs
128-384 GB DDR4 RAM
NVMe SSD in RAID 10
10 Gbps up/down

Datacenter Location: Amsterdam, The Netherlands
Network: 64425
Virtualization Type: KVM

**Payment methods**
- PayPal
- Cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum)
- CreditCard
- Alipay
- Wechatpay
- Sofort
- Bancontact
- iDeal
For PayPal, CreditCard fees are calculated

**Company details**
Legal name: SKB Enterprise B.V.
Address: Kingsfordweg 151, 1043 GR, Amsterdam, NL
Sales: sales@skb-enterprise.com
Chamber of Commerce NL #: 69737770
VAT: NL857990822B01
Our website: https://skb-enterprise.com/
